resources.string:
To record a session:
 	 	 1. Make sure your device is ON and paired with your phone (go to bluetooth settings to pair the device if not)
 	 	2. Click START"

To stop the music / end the session, select "STOP" from the same menu.

To record a session without playing Biomusic, uncheck the "Play Sound" switch on the home page before clicking "START".

Make sure your finger is correctly placed on the TPS as follows:
